name: The Trolley Problem (grinky, Kimbsy, BethFromAbove)
description:
There's money to be made in trolleys... and this car park has a whole lot of trolleys! 

Corral the capricious carts into the trolley cage before the time runs out.

Feel free to retrieve any of the pound coins you find left in the trolleys. Naturally, the more trolleys you capture in one run, the more money you get! 

Try to bank the most trolleys in the time available.

Arrow keys to move.

The Trolley Problem is a game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, a 48 hour game making marathon. The game is written in JavaScript using Phaser 3. 

Music and sound effects from various sources: 

http://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/216566 by Iwan ‘qubodup’ Gabovitch under CC-BY 3.0 License

Newer Wave Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
